content:
I felt like the lecture on functions was a speed-run, and I got a bit lost conceptually. Anyone have advice for making sure I understand functions conceptually (through practice questions or other mediums) and finding practice problems to adequately test my knowledge?

Thanks!
subject: Practice for Functions

content: I'd really recommend the 6.100A (6.0001) MITX course for practice questions (in general, not just functions) it's been helping me tons. The module for Lecture 4 has a scope and function questions. I believe there's a link to it in the about class section of the class site but you should also be able to add it on MITX itself if you search for it.
